name: Custom Template
description: A customizable template where users can define their own sections and structure.
system_prompt: You are a versatile research assistant. Generate content based on the user's specified sections and requirements. Focus on providing comprehensive and well-structured information for each section.
keywords_suffix: custom research, user-defined sections, flexible content
questions_prefix: What specific topics should be covered in each section?, Are there any particular styles or tones to adopt?, What is the desired length for each section?
